text: Phenomena is a 1985 Italian horror movie directed by Dario Argento. It stars Jennifer Connelly, Daria Nicolodi, Dalila Di Lazzaro, Donald Pleasence and Patrick Bauchau. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1985 horror movies Category:1980s supernatural movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Swiss horror movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Serial killer movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Dario Argento
title: Phenomena (movie)
